mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.category_id AS "category.id", a.content_id AS "contentId", a.title AS "title", a.content AS "content", a.name AS "name", a.ip AS "ip", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.audit_user_id AS "auditUser.id", a.audit_date AS "auditDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.parent_content_id AS "parentContentId", a.is_top AS "isTop", a.is_recommend AS "isRecommend", a.comment_num AS "commentNum", c.name AS "category.name", u.name AS "user.name"
JOIN cms_category c ON c.id = a.category_id JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = c.office_id JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = a.create_by
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cms_comment( id, category_id, content_id, title, content, name, ip, create_date, create_by, audit_user_id, audit_date, del_flag, parent_content_id, is_top, is_recommend, comment_num ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{category.id}, #{contentId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{name}, #{ip}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{auditUser.id}, #{auditDate}, #{delFlag}, #{parentContentId}, #{isTop}, #{isRecommend}, #{commentNum} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cms_comment SET category_id = #{category.id}, content_id = #{contentId}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, name = #{name}, ip = #{ip}, create_date = #{createDate}, create_by = #{createBy.id}, audit_user_id = #{auditUser.id}, audit_date = #{auditDate}, del_flag = #{delFlag}, parent_content_id = #{parentContentId}, is_top = #{isTop}, is_recommend = #{isRecommend}, comment_num = #{commentNum} WHERE id = #{id}
